name: nuxt-netlify-cms-starter-template
description: Build server-less, static websites with Vue.js and Netlify CMS.
author: Julien Dargelos <contact@juliendargelos.com>

scripts.test: yarn cache:stash && node scripts/test && yarn cache:pop && yarn --cwd test install
scripts.cache:stash: [ -d test/node_modules ] && [ -f test/yarn.lock ] && mv test/node_modules cache/node_modules && mv test/yarn.lock cache/yarn.lock || true
scripts.cache:pop: [ -d cache/node_modules ] && [ -f cache/yarn.lock ] && mv cache/node_modules test/node_modules && mv cache/yarn.lock test/yarn.lock || true
scripts.vue-cli:init: rm -rf test && DEMO=true vue init . test
